## ChannelOptions."grpc.client\_idle\_timeout\_ms" property

Timeout (in milliseconds) after the last RPC finishes on the client channel at which the channel goes back into IDLE state.

**Signature:**

```typescript
"grpc.client_idle_timeout_ms"?: number | undefined;
```

## Remarks

Minimum value is 1 second.
